description:
A sloppily worn lab coat, lifeless eyes just like a dead fish`s. He`s the most un-teacher-like high school teacher, http://anidb.net/ch11433 [Ginpachi Sakata]. The class he`s in charge of, 3Z, is filled with `intensive` students who have created a horrifying amusement park.
Source: M-U
Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event on 16 August 2025 at Hulic Hall Tokyo in Tokyo and 99 additional venues across Japan. The regular TV broadcast started on 7 October 2025.

REGULAR.description:
Principal Hata challenges their teacher Ginpachi to have every student score over 80 in a test otherwise the class faces remedial lessons and Ginpachi gets a pay cut. Ginpachi and his students decide to do a cheating plan.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: 100 Ten Toranakute Ii 70 Ten de Iitte Juku no Sensei Iu yo ne
100点とらなくていい70点でいいって塾の先生言うよね
Cram School Teachers Sure Love Telling You to Aim for a 70, Not a 100
Ihr müsst keine 100 Punkte kriegen. 70 reichen schon. Sagen Nachhilfelehrer immer, oder?

REGULAR.description:
Ginpachi arrives at his class and sees that his students change based on what he says.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Mitame ga Kawatte mo Nakami wa Kawaranai no ga Ningen / Test wa Ikutsu ni Natte mo Iya na Mono / Hito ni Soudan Suru Tokitte, Taigai Soudan Suru Mae ni Jibun no Naka de Mou Kotae ga Deteru
People Can Change How They Look but Not Who They Are / No Matter How Old You Get, Tests Always Suck / When You Ask Someone for Advice, You Usually Know the Solution Yourself Deep Down
見た目が変わっても中身は変わらないのが人間 / テストはいくつになっても嫌なもの / 人に相談する時って, たいがい相談する前に自分の中でもう答えが出てる

REGULAR.description:
Sakata Ginpachi, Class 3-Z’s eccentric homeroom teacher, tries to guide his equally eccentric students!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Fudan Shaberanai Yatsu ga Totsuzen Bokeru to Reaction ni Komaru ga Komatta Tokoro de Through Dekinai Ijou Warau Shikanai
When the Quiet Kid Cracks a Joke, It`s Hard to React, but You Can`t Ignore It, So All You Can Do Is Laugh
普段喋らない奴が突然ボケるとリアクションに困るが困ったところでスルーできない以上笑うしかない

REGULAR.description:
Sakata Ginpachi, Class 3-Z’s eccentric homeroom teacher, tries to guide his equally eccentric students!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Horror and Comedy Are Two Sides of the Same Coin
Kyoufu to Warai wa Kamihitoe
恐怖と笑いは紙一重

REGULAR.description:
Three bank robbers are hiding in the school and Hata decides to offer a reward for them.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Nice Having a Party Member Who Can Use Safe Passage
Toramana Tsukaeru Yatsu ga Party ni Iru to, Sore wa Sore de Benri
トラマナ使える奴がパーティーにいると, それはそれで便利

REGULAR.description:
Shinpachi and Tae are going to change schools, so class 3-Z throws them a farewell party.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Everyone Fantasizes a Little Bit About Transferring Because of Their Dad`s Job
Otousan no Shigoto no Tsugou de Tenkou toka, Chotto dake Akogareru
お父さんの仕事の都合で転校とか, ちょっとだけ憧れる

REGULAR.description:
The students of class 3-Z start doing a general cleaning of the school.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Mukashi no Jump o Yomifukette Ita Sei de Oosouji ga Hakadorimasen Deshita
Spent Too Much Time Reading Old Copies of Jump and Didn`t Get Much Cleaning Done
昔のジャンプを読みふけっていたせいで大掃除がはかどりませんでした

REGULAR.description:
Class 3-Z goes on a school trip to Kyoto, and Hijikata tries to make sure everyone follows the rules.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Tabi no Haji wa Kakisute tte Iu kedo, Narubeku Nara Haji wa Kakitakunai mon Da
They Say Nobody`ll Ever Know If You Embarrass Yourself on a Holiday, but Nobody Wants to Embarrass Themselves in the First Place
旅の恥はかき捨てって言うけど, なるべくなら恥はかきたくないもんだ

REGULAR.description:
The school festival is coming, and all the problems that come with it.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Bunkasai Nante Tsumannee tte Itteru Kuse ni, Hontou wa Omae Tanoshinderu Daro?
You Say School Festivals Suck, but You`re Enjoying Yourself, Aren`t You?
文化祭なんてつまんねぇって言ってるくせに, 本当はお前楽しんでるだろ?

REGULAR.description:
The gang members of class 3-Z become involved in the monk pants raid that affects all of Kabukicho.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Not Everything`s Better Short
なんでもかんでも短くすりゃいいってもんでもない

REGULAR.description:
Kamui decides to confront Takasugi and the other gang members from Gintama High School to settle everything once and for all.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Wazato Okurete Kite Medatou to Suru Yatsu ni Dropkick
Whoever Shows Up Late on Purpose to Stand Out Deserves a Dropkick
わざと遅れて来て目立とうとする奴にドロップキック

REGULAR.description:
Some time after graduating, Shinpachi decides to organize a reunion with the former students of class 3-Z.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Dousoukai no Mukashibanashi to Anime no Zenwa Kaisou wa Kekkyoku Honpen ga Tarinai Toki no Umeawase
Old Times Talk in Reunions and Last Episode Recaps in Anime Are Just Fillers for When You Have Nothing to Show or Talk About
同窓会の昔話とアニメの前話回想は結局本編が足りない時の埋め合わせ
Episode S1
まるわかり 教えて! ホテ八先生
Gintama: 3-nen Z-gumi Ginpachi-sensei
3年Z班银八老师
Gintama: Mr. Ginpachi`s Zany Class
Gintama: Mr.Ginpachi`s Zany Class
銀魂 3年Z組銀八先生
3年Z组银八老师
Gintama - 3-nen Z-gumi Ginpachi-sensei
銀魂まるちばーすアニメ『3年Z組銀八先生』
